Reviews.Title: error in product title description
Reviews.Author: L. Cheung
Reviews.Content: Amazon advertises this product to have optical zoom. But if you enlarge the product picture, it clearly states "digital zoom". Digital zoom is general not of higher quality than optical zoom.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5inch Display Digital Camera.
4X Digital Zoom and 5.0 Megapixels Resolution.
SD Card Storage for extended photo storage. Number of Photos is Limited To The Capacity Of AE88Memory Cards.
Powered by 2 x AAA Size Batteries easily Replaceable From Any Convenience Store.
ProductInfo.Name: Zenex ZN-DC5310 5MP Digital Camera with 4x Digital Zoom (White)
